turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: I placed an order last week, order number #12345, and it still says 'processing'. What's going on? I need this package soon!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance:
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. Let me check on order #12345 for you. One moment, please...

Okay, I see that your order is currently being processed at our warehouse. It looks like there was a slight delay due to a high volume of orders. It is now expected to ship within 24-48 hours. You will receive a tracking number once it ships. I apologize for the delay.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: 48 hours?! Seriously? I paid for expedited shipping! This is ridiculous.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. Let me look into the shipping cost for order #12345. According to my information you chose standard shipping at checkout, which does not guarantee a delivery date. Expedited options are available and can be chosen during checkout. If you would like to know more about the difference between shipping methods I can provide a link to our FAQ page. I can also look into what expedited options are available and how much they would cost to ship your package faster, however this might incur additional costs.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, so say I *had* chosen express shipping... what's your cutoff time for same-day shipping? Is it different depending on the day of the week?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: That's a good question. Our cutoff time for same-day shipping on express orders is 2 PM PST, Monday through Friday. Orders placed after 2 PM PST or on weekends/holidays will ship the next business day. We do our best to honor this cutoff, however it is not guaranteed. Choosing express shipping does not guarantee same day shipment. This depends on order volume and item availability.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Alright, that's helpful. Thanks for the clarification.
